name: Customizable Default Sort Option
author: Pamasich
label: Change default sort
desc:
When you access a page on Mbin without specifying sort options in the URL, default options are applied that you cannot customize. If you for example want to always see the latest threads, you always have to manually switch to the "newest" sort.

This addon tries to add this missing element of customization by redirecting you from the default sorted page to your chosen explicitly sorted one.

Mbin has four distinct types of sorted pages that have different options available to them. You can disable this addon from working on any of them by setting them to "default".
